languages.text: "Не думаю, что навигатор и главный кормчий будут в восторге от затеи. Все же варп — дело нешуточное, и на мостике должен быть полный порядок и дисциплина... да и вам отвлекаться не стоит!"

traits.locale_text: "Не думаю, что навигатор и главный кормчий будут в восторге от затеи. Все же варп — дело нешуточное, и на мостике должен быть полный порядок и дисциплина... да и вам отвлекаться не стоит!"

languages.text: "I doubt our Navigator and Master Helmsman would be thrilled. The warp does not forgive frivolity, so order and discipline during translation must be absolute... and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should not have any distractions, either!"
languages.original_text: "Не думаю, что навигатор и главный кормчий будут в восторге от затеи. Все же варп — дело нешуточное, и на мостике должен быть полный порядок и дисциплина... да и вам отвлекаться не стоит!"

traits.locale_text: "I doubt the Navigator and the Master Helmsman will be thrilled. The warp is no joke, so the order and discipline on the bridge must be absolute... And you should not have any distractions, either!"
"I doubt the Navigator and the Master Helmsman will be thrilled. The warp is no joke, so the order and discipline on the bridge must be absolute... And you should not have any distractions, either!"
"I doubt the Navigator and the Master Helmsman will be thrilled. The warp is no joke, so order and discipline on the bridge must be absolute... And you should not have any distractions, either!"
"I doubt the Navigator and the Master Helmsman will be thrilled. The warp is no joke, so order and discipline on the bridge must be absolute... And you should not have any distractions, either!"
"I doubt the Navigator and the Master Helmsman will be thrilled. The warp is no joke, so order and discipline on the bridge must be absolute... And you should not have any distractions, either!"
"I doubt the Navigator and the Master Helmsman will be thrilled. The warp is no joke, so order and discipline on the bridge must be absolute... And you should not have any distractions, either!"

"I doubt our Navigator and Master Helmsman would be thrilled. The warp does not forgive frivolity, so order and discipline during translation must be absolute... and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should not have any distractions, either!"

"I doubt our Navigator and Master Helmsman would be thrilled. The warp does not forgive frivolity, so order and discipline during translation must be absolute... and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should not have any distractions, either!"

languages.text: « Je doute que cela plaise à la navigatrice et au maître timonier, Votre Seigneurie. On ne plaisante pas avec le Warp, il est donc primordial que l'ordre et la discipline règnent sur la passerelle tout au long de l'opération... Ce qui implique que vous ne devriez pas avoir la moindre distraction ! »
languages.original_text: "I doubt our Navigator and Master Helmsman would be thrilled. The warp does not forgive frivolity, so order and discipline during translation must be absolute... and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should not have any distractions, either!"

traits.locale_text: « Je doute que cela plaise à la navigatrice et au maître timonier, Votre Seigneurie. On ne plaisante pas avec le Warp, il est donc primordial que l'ordre et la discipline règnent sur la passerelle tout au long de l'opération... Ce qui implique que vous ne devriez pas avoir la moindre distraction ! »

languages.text: «Dudo que a nuestra navegante y al maestro timonel les haga mucha gracia. La disformidad no perdona la frivolidad, así que durante la transición deben imperar un orden y una disciplina absolutos... ¡y mi{mf|lord|lady} tampoco debería distraerse!».
languages.original_text: "I doubt our Navigator and Master Helmsman would be thrilled. The warp does not forgive frivolity, so order and discipline during translation must be absolute... and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should not have any distractions, either!"

traits.locale_text: «Dudo que a nuestra navegante y al maestro timonel les haga mucha gracia. La disformidad no perdona la frivolidad, así que durante la transición deben imperar un orden y una disciplina absolutos... ¡y mi{mf|lord|lady} tampoco debería distraerse!».

languages.text: 「航宙士やマスター・ヘルムスマンはどういう顔をするでしょうか。<歪み>では軽率な振る舞いは命取りです。ブリッジの秩序と規律を揺るがしてはいけません…それに、陛下が動揺なさることも御法度です！」
languages.original_text: "I doubt our Navigator and Master Helmsman would be thrilled. The warp does not forgive frivolity, so order and discipline during translation must be absolute... and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should not have any distractions, either!"

traits.locale_text: 「果たして航宙士やマスター・ヘルムスマンはどういう顔をするのでしょうか。<歪み>は冗談では済まないので、ブリッジの秩序と規律を揺るがしてはいけません…それに、陛下が動揺なさることも御法度です！」

languages.text: “我们的导航者和舵手长未必会赞同这个主意。亚空间可不是闹着玩的，因此舰桥必须保持绝对的秩序与纪律……而且，您本人也一点都不能分心，大人！”
languages.original_text: "I doubt our Navigator and Master Helmsman would be thrilled. The warp does not forgive frivolity, so order and discipline during translation must be absolute... and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should not have any distractions, either!"

traits.locale_text: “我们的导航者和舵手长未必会赞同这个主意。亚空间可不是闹着玩的，因此舰桥必须保持绝对的秩序与纪律……而且，您本人也一点都不能分心，大人！”

languages.text: "Ich bezweifle, dass unser Navigator und der Hauptsteuermann davon begeistert wären. Der Warp verzeiht keine Frivolität, daher müssen Ordnung und Disziplin während der Übersetzung absolut sein ... und Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} sollte durch nichts abgelenkt sein!"
languages.original_text: "I doubt our Navigator and Master Helmsman would be thrilled. The warp does not forgive frivolity, so order and discipline during translation must be absolute... and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should not have any distractions, either!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bezweifle, dass unser Navigator und der Hauptsteuermann davon begeistert wären. Der Warp verzeiht keine Frivolität, daher müssen Ordnung und Disziplin während der Übersetzung absolut sein ... und Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} sollte durch nichts abgelenkt sein!"

languages.text: "Rotacımız ile Başserdümen'in hoşuna gideceğini sanmıyorum. Öteboyutun ciddiyetsizliğe tahammülü yoktur. Bundandır ki geçiş esnasında düzen ve disiplin zaruridir. Ayrıca... {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin de dikkatinin dağılmaması gerekir!"
languages.original_text: "I doubt our Navigator and Master Helmsman would be thrilled. The warp does not forgive frivolity, so order and discipline during translation must be absolute... and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} should not have any distractions, either!"
